name: api-nexus
description: Generation of API documentation for the GraphQl and Rest API

scripts.build:client: PARENT_DIR=$(dirname $(pwd)); if [ "$(basename $PARENT_DIR)" = "node_modules" ]; then OUTPUT_PATH=../../doc/dist/bundle.js; else OUTPUT_PATH=$(pwd)/doc/dist/bundle.js; fi; esbuild src/index.js --bundle --outfile=$OUTPUT_PATH --loader:.js=jsx --loader:.css=css
scripts.build:server: PARENT_DIR=$(dirname $(pwd)); if [ "$(basename $PARENT_DIR)" = "node_modules" ]; then OUTPUT_PATH=../../doc/build/server.js; else OUTPUT_PATH=$(pwd)/doc/build/server.js; fi; esbuild server/server.jsx --bundle --outfile=$OUTPUT_PATH --platform=node
scripts.build:css: PARENT_DIR=$(dirname $(pwd)); if [ "$(basename $PARENT_DIR)" = "node_modules" ]; then OUTPUT_PATH=../../doc/dist/bootstrap-bundle.min.css; else OUTPUT_PATH=$(pwd)/doc/dist/bootstrap-bundle.min.css; fi; esbuild src/bootstrap/bootstrap.min.css --bundle --outfile=$OUTPUT_PATH --minify
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:css &&  npm run build:server
